auth.terms2: you accept the terms and conditions

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.description: As specified in the security section of the app, your password is used for encryption and decryption and only you have access to it. Therefore, we can't restore your account without the password. You can register again by entering your email below so we can delete your account and all your files.

info.title: Personal
info.description: Check your storage user and account details

advice1.title: What data can be edited?
advice1.description: For strict security reasons and to protect your data at Internxt we do not allow the data of a user account such as email to be modified.

advice2.title: Security account
advice2.description: Your files are encrypted before leaving your device, so only you can access your files, no tricks, no hidden things, just privacy, that’s Internxt.

plans.label: Plans
plans.title: Plans
plans.description: Find the different storage and solution options that Internxt offers

section2.title: Secure by default
section2.point1: Military-grade encryption to ensure your privacy.

section3.title: Unlimited access and sync
section3.point1: Access your files, photos, and backups from all your devices.
section3.point3: Backup any folder on your computer.

advice1.title: Change password
advice1.description: Changing your password will sign you out from all your devices. The password introduced will be needed for logging in again.

advice2.title: What should you keep in mind so that your password is secure?

advice3.title: New encryption key
advice3.description: By changing your password, all your files will be un-encrypted with your old password, and then re-encrypted using your new password, and thus you won't lose access to them! This action cannot be undone.

advice4.title: What data can be edited?
advice4.description: For strict security reasons and to protect your data at Internxt we do not allow the data of a user account such as email to be modified.

lock.title: Enter your password to continue
lock.description: For security reasons, you must enter your password before being able to make any changes on this page.

errors.notVerified: We could not verify your password

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.description: Remember that if you forget the password, you will lose access to all your files. We recommend using a password manager.

2FA.title: Two Factor Authentication (2FA)
2FA.description: Two-factor authentication provides an extra layer of security y requiring an extra verification when you log in. In addition to your password, you'll also need a generated code.

download.title: Download Authy
download.description: We recommend using Authy, but you can setup the 2FA process with any other 2FA of your choice.

qr.title: Scan QR with the 2FA app
qr.description: If you are unable to scan he QR, insert this code into the app.

backup-key.title: Save backup key
backup-key.description: Copy this code and keep it secure, you will need it in case you lose your device.

disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.description: To disable Two-Factor Authentication, type the code generated by the app into the input below.

errors.incorrect: The code is not correct, try again
errors.notVerified: We could not verify your code

backupKey.title: Backup key
backupKey.description: In case you forget your password you can use your backup key to recover your account. Never share this code with anyone.
backupKey.error: We could not generate your backup key

faq1.title: Why do I lose all my files if I lose my password?
faq1.description:
Your password is the only way to access your account, the Internxt team cannot access your account on change your password. This is to prevent anyone from accessing your account or steal your information.

Among other things your password is used to encrypt your encryption key so not even the Internxt has access to it. Every time you log in you need your password to decrypt this encryption key that way we ensure you are the only one holding the encryption keys.

faq2.title: How can I keep safe my credentials?
faq2.description: We recommend to use a password manager to store your credentials safely not just for accessing the Internxt platform but to keep yourself safe and productive while browsing.

faq3.title: Can I recover my account with the backup key?
faq3.description: If you keep somewhere safe your encryption key, recover your data following the steps outlined in the email you will receive when clicking “forgot password”.

faq4.title: Do I lose all my files if I change my password?
faq4.description: No, since you are already logged in you can change your password without losing anything. Make sure you have chosen a strong password and it is not found in any data breach.
